name: Rapid Toy Packing
description:
This game is made for the Trijam 212 with the theme: Too Much.

In this game, you play as an employee packaging toys into the right boxes. However, your hands are slippery and unable to grasp the toys easily, slipping them from your hand. How will you overcome this situation, especially during your shift?

The control is only left mouse button and mouse cursor.

Leave your highscore down the comments and see who is better at packaging toys with slippery hands. Good luck!

Note: if you see toys just appeared into the sides of the walls, it's a prevention from the toys clipping out of the game. This is my first time using RigidBody2D and here I'm experimenting to apply them in this scenario.
